resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105994</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105994</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206010</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Aviation: From Sand Dunes to Sonic Booms</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Luftfahrt: Von den Sanddünen zu den 
Überschallknallen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Aviation : Des dunes de sable aux perches 
Soniques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aviação: Das dunas de areia aos 
crescimentos sonic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Aeronautica: Dalle dune di sabbia alle aste 
sonic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αεροπορία: Από τους αμμόλοφους άμμου στους 
ηχιτικούς βραχίονες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aviación: De las dunas de arena a los auges
sonic</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">features 100 aircraft, airfields, research labs, military installations, battle sites, launch facilities, and other places that tell about people and events that made the U.S. a world leader in aviation. Highlights of this travel itinerary include stories of Lt. Edward Rickenbacker, Charles Lindbergh, Amelia Earhart, and the Wright Brothers.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kennzeichnet Flugzeug 100, Flugplätze, Forschung 
Labors, militärische Installationen, Schlachtsites, 
Produkteinführung Teildienste und andere Plätze, die über Leute und
Fälle erklären, die die VEREINIGTEN STAATEN einen Weltführer in der
Luftfahrt bildeten. Höhepunkte dieses Spielraumreisewegs 
schließen Geschichten des Leutnants Edward Rickenbacker, Charles 
Lindbergh, Amelia Earhart und die Wright Brüder ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">comporte l'avion 100, les terrains d'aviation, les
laboratoires de recherches, les installations militaires, les sites de
bataille, les équipements de lancement, et d'autres endroits qui 
indiquent au sujet des personnes et des événements qui ont fait aux 
ETATS-UNIS une amorce du monde dans l'aviation. Les points 
culminants de cet itinéraire de voyage incluent des histoires de 
lieutenant Edouard Rickenbacker, Charles Lindbergh, Amelia 
Earhart, et les frères de Wright.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">caracteriza o avião 100, os aeródromos, os 
laboratórios de pesquisa, instalações militares, locais da batalha,
facilidades do lançamento, e outros lugares que dizem sobre os povos 
e os eventos que fizeram aos ESTADOS UNIDOS um líder do mundo na 
aviação. Os destaques deste itinerary do curso incluem 
histórias do tenente Edward Rickenbacker, Charles Lindbergh, Amelia 
Earhart, e irmãos de Wright.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">caratterizza il velivolo 100, gli aerodromi, i 
laboratori di ricerca, le installazioni militari, i luoghi di 
battaglia, le attrezzature del lancio ed altri posti che dicono a 
circa la gente e gli eventi che hanno reso agli STATI UNITI un 
capo del mondo nell'aeronautica. I punti culminanti di 
questo itinerario di corsa includono le storia del tenente Edward 
Rickenbacker, Charles Lindbergh, Amelia Earhart ed i fratelli di 
Wright.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χαρακτηρίζει 100 αεροσκάφη, τα αεροδρόμια, τα 
ερευνητικά εργαστήρια, τις στρατιωτικές εγκαταστάσεις, τις 
περιοχές μάχης, τους χώρους έναρξης, και άλλες θέσεις που λένε 
για τους ανθρώπους και τα γεγονότα που έκαναν τις ΗΠΑ έναν 
παγκόσμιο ηγέτη στην αεροπορία. Τα κυριώτερα σημεία αυτής 
της περιήγησης ταξιδιού περιλαμβάνουν τις ιστορίες του υπολοχαγού
Edward Rickenbacker, Charles Lindbergh, Amelia 
Earhart, και οι αδελφοί Wright.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ofrece el avión 100, campos de aviación, 
laboratorios de investigación, instalaciones militares, sitios de la 
batalla, recursos del lanzamiento, y otros lugares que hablen de la 
gente y de los acontecimientos que hicieron los ESTADOS UNIDOS a 
arranque de cinta del mundo en la aviación. Los toques de luz 
de este itinerario del recorrido incluyen historias del teniente 
Edward Rickenbacker, Charles Lindbergh, Amelia Earhart, y los hermanos
de Wright.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206010</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105994</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/aviation-from-sand-dunes-to-sonic-booms</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
